title: Develop User Registration and Authentication
description: Implement user registration and authentication functionality for the system. This task includes creating a secure registration flow, user account activation, password recovery, and two-factor authentication. Additionally, consider integrating with existing identity providers such as Google, Facebook, and LinkedIn to streamline the user registration process. To ensure compatibility with future system enhancements, utilize industry-standard libraries for authentication such as Passport.js or JWT. Furthermore, prioritize user privacy and security by adhering to best practices like OAuth 2.0.

title: Design overall system architecture
description: Create a high-level design for the translation system considering frontend, backend, AI, and database components.

title: Develop frontend components
description: Create user-friendly interfaces for users to input text for translation, view translations, and manage preferences.

title: Develop backend services
description: Create APIs and services for handling requests, managing translations, and communicating with AI models.

title: Implement AI and machine learning models
description: Integrate AI and machine learning models for providing precise translations.

title: Set up and configure databases
description: Create, configure, and manage databases for storing translation data, user information, and AI models.

title: Implement DevOps and CI/CD pipelines
description: Set up continuous integration, deployment, and delivery processes for the project.

title: Perform QA and testing
description: Test the entire system for functionality, performance, security, and usability.
dependencies: Implement AI and machine learning models

title: Document system design and implementation
description: Write clear documentation for the system architecture, development process, and API usage.
dependencies: Implement AI and machine learning models
